title: Bloody Deed
description: Married life wasn't supposed to be this way...Sadly, haywire Magick, crushing debt, and a chronic lack of employment has a way of leaving even the best of relationships in the tall grass. For Eugene Law, guilt packs a heavy bag. Haunted by ghosts of doubt, West Florida's newest Magician must reconcile his past if he is to have any hope of seeing his future intact. Bad luck and poor decisions lands Gene up to his neck in blood-thirsty Skeeters, eye-to-eye with the Five Star Toaster, and at the wrong end of more than one Lost Button. Through it all, he'll be forced to learn membership in The Flock has its privileges, but it always comes at a price.With Magick, sometimes you have to be the hero, or die trying.Bloody Deed is the fourth book in the Tales of Weird Florida, an urban fantasy series that rose from the multi #1 45-Minute Short Read Science Fiction and Fantasy Tales of Weird Florida Short Stories, and explores the tough and often wrong decisions a new husband makes in the face sharp fangs and long odds.
author: Martin   Shannon
